text:
On 12/10/2024 at 09:47 AM, Christine Moyer wrote:
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/10/2024 at 09:47 AM)
Subject:Re: SAAS backcountry
Yes but Dec 20-23 falls during the winter break.
In mediation I specifically asked Judge Rosen as I thought we had to negotiate these dates to take boys to Whistler. He confirmed I did not as it
fell during winter break which overrides the regular schedule. I asked him to communicate that to your side.
On 12/10/2024 at 07:26 AM, Robert Moyer wrote:
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/10/2024 at 09:44 AM)
Subject:Re: SAAS backcountry
Sorry. I assumed this weekend was make up and next was back to regularly scheduled programming?
On 12/10/2024 at 07:24 AM, Christine Moyer wrote:
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/10/2024 at 07:25 AM)
Subject:Re: SAAS backcountry
Leave Friday Dec 20, return Monday Dec 23
On 12/10/2024 at 07:11 AM, Robert Moyer wrote:
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/10/2024 at 07:24 AM)
Subject:Re: SAAS backcountry
Thanks. What weekend?
On 12/10/2024 at 07:02 AM, Christine Moyer wrote:
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/10/2024 at 07:10 AM)
Subject:SAAS backcountry
I’ll review the invoices and pay the larger amount.
There are some other documents that need to be completed that I will be sending over.
I also have the whistler place for the weekend and plan to take the boys. I’ll send over the travel authorization as well.
Message 70 of 287
I don't want to argue, either. And you went straight to the lawyers in this instead of even asking if we could work together. That mode won't help us
unless Natalie is on a permanent retainer, so you can always go after me. I am suggesting a path forward of compromise and solutions.
The SAAS calendar explicitly states that Winter Break starts on December 23, 2024, which suggests that December 21–22 is still part of the regular
schedule, not Winter Break. If the weekend should not be interrupted, then it has to start for it not to be interrupted.
Let's not be jerks to each other. Would you prefer to insist that Winter Break starts before Winter Break or work together?
Sent:12/10/2024 at 10:08 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/10/2024 at 10:37 AM)
Subject:Re: SAAS backcountry
Attachments:Winter_Break_2024.jpg (141 KB)
